tool_description: Farba API helps developers get the right color from the clothing image.
name: Color Extractor for Apparel
title: Color Extractor for Apparel

api_list.name: Remove Simple Background
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to remove background from the image. It returns PNG image with alpha channel.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://color-extractor-for-apparel2.p.rapidapi.com/background"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "color-extractor-for-apparel2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Extract Colors
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to extract colors from an image.

api_list.name: Extract Colors_base64
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to extract colors from a base64 encoded image.
